question: Refer to the figure <image 1>, which term describes reading aloud in unison or parts with a whole class, small group, or individual students so that students hear the text at the same time they read it?
description: The image depicts a classroom setting where a group of students is seated at desks arranged in rows. The students appear to be engaged in an activity, possibly listening or participating in a reading exercise. The classroom has a green chalkboard on one wall with various educational posters and diagrams displayed. The students are focused on something in front of them, suggesting they might be reading aloud together. The arrangement and the nature of the activity suggest a structured reading session involving multiple students.
